string-array.name: quarantineList
string-array.item: Isolate yourself from the rest of the occupants of your house. Make sure you are in a room that is well-ventilated and comfortable.
Your bathroom should be separate from the rest of the occupants.
When you have to interact with members of the house maintain a distance of at least 1m while using gloves and a mask.
Make sure to wash your hands with soap very regularly, when soap and water are not available use hand sanitizer.
Disinfect and clean all surfaces you frequently use. Such as: phone, tablet, laptop, tv and ac remotes, light switches, door knobs, tables and countertops, toilets, faucets, and sinks.
Make sure you do not share any dishes, glasses, cutlery, towels, or clothes with any of the other occupants of your house.
